radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal echotexture of liver with no focal lesions, patent portal vein with normal hepatopetal flow, no intra- or extra-hepatic biliary dilatation, common bile duct measures 5 mm, mobile gallstone within gallbladder measuring approximately 1 cm with no signs of gallbladder wall thickening or pericholecystic fluid, pancreas not visualized, limited views of kidneys unremarkable without hydronephrosis, splenic size 8.2 cm, no free fluid within abdomen.
